casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Kenneth COLVIN, Jr., Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156627
COA: 339220 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 2, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's July 3, 2018 order is considered, and it is DENIED, because it does not appear that the order was entered erroneously. The motion to appoint counsel is DENIED.
